description:
The world's only VPN app that can't spy on you. Academic-designed, Swiss made.
Stop being tracked online. The only VPN that can't spy on you, even if it wanted to. Made in Switzerland, trusted by privacy advocates worldwide.

‚≠êÔ∏è As seen in: PCMag, TechRadar, Wirecutter, ZDNet, Tom's Guide, Forbes, Bloomberg, TechCrunch, How-To Geek, PCWorld, Heise Online

BROWSE WITHOUT LEAVING A TRACE

Tired of wondering who's watching? Traditional VPNs can theoretically log your activity. NymVPN is fundamentally different: our decentralized network makes centralized logging impossible by design. This isn't a "no-logs policy"‚Äîit's a "can't log" architecture.

‚úì True anonymity: Pay with crypto or cash, no email required
‚úì 50+ countries, hundreds of independent servers
‚úì Multi-device protection: 10 devices with one anonymous code
‚úì Swiss-based with academic-grade privacy standards

CHOOSE YOUR PRIVACY LEVEL

‚ö° Fast Mode ‚Äì Lightning-fast speeds for streaming and browsing. 2-hop by default so one server knows who you are, another knows what you're doing‚Äîbut never both.
üîí Anonymous Mode ‚Äì Maximum privacy through a 5-hop mixnet with noise-generating technology and up to 5 layers of encryption. Designed to resist even AI-powered traffic analysis and advanced surveillance.

WHY NYMVPN IS DIFFERENT

‚Ä¢ Metadata protection ‚Äì Unlike other VPNs, we protect not just your data but the patterns you leave behind
‚Ä¢ Censorship resistant ‚Äì Access blocked information in restrictive environments with AmneziaWG, QUIC and stealth protocols
‚Ä¢ Zero-knowledge payments ‚Äì Your subscription is cryptographically unlinked from your activity
‚Ä¢ University-designed ‚Äì Built by PhD cryptographers from KU Leuven and EPFL with 20+ peer-reviewed publications

INDEPENDENTLY VERIFIED

‚Ä¢ 4 security audits (2021-2024) by JP Aumasson, Oak Security, Cryspen, Cure53
‚Ä¢ Open-source and transparent ("Signals of Trustworthy VPNs")
‚Ä¢ 10,000+ users already trust NymVPN for their privacy

ESSENTIAL FEATURES

‚Ä¢ High-speed connections with 50+ country selection
‚Ä¢ Kill switch prevents data leaks
‚Ä¢ Completely ad-free experience
‚Ä¢ State-of-the-art cryptographic stack


PERFECT FOR

‚Üí Streaming and browsing without being tracked by advertisers
‚Üí Secure public WiFi connections at cafes, airports, hotels
‚Üí Anyone in restrictive countries needing reliable access
‚Üí People who want true anonymity, not just hidden IP addresses
‚Üí Journalists and activists needing untraceable communication

Download now. Connect in seconds. Disappear online.
